translations: v.节省；保护，保藏；将……制成蜜饯（conserve 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 保乳, 节约, 保存的
保护水资源, 下一篇
保乳治疗, 保乳, 早期乳腺癌保乳手术, 乳腺癌保乳手术
节能, 节约能源, 能源节省
模守恒赝势, 模守恒

sentences.sentence: If no one owns the resource concerned, no one has an interest in conserving it or fostering it: fish is the best example of this.
sentences.translation: 如果没人拥有相关的资源，就没有人有兴趣去保护或培育它：鱼类就是最好的例子。

sentences.sentence: In colder weather, your cat will curl up into a tight, heat-conserving ball.
sentences.translation: 在更冷的天气里，你的猫会蜷缩成紧紧的一团来保暖。

sentences.sentence: What we've found is that sauropods were experts at conserving energy.
sentences.translation: 我们发现，蜥脚类动物非常擅长于储存能量。
